description:
Haruhiro and his party are enjoying their first earnings. They are getting used to life here, but continue to work hard to live.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Are Goblin Pouches Filled with Our Dreams?
Goblin Fukuro ni wa Oretachi no Yume ga Tsumatte Iru ka
Ist der Beutel des Goblins vollgestopft mit unseren Träumen?
Les sacs des gobelins renferment-ils nos rêves ?
ゴブリン袋には俺たちの夢がつまっているか
